text: Luis Raúl Martínez (March 6, 1962 - February 2, 2014), better known by his stage name Luis Raúl, was a Puerto Rican actor, comedian, and host. Born in Ponce, he started working in 1983. He most often worked as a stand-up comic. Raúl died from bilateral pneumonia on February 2, 2014, aged 51, in San Juan. He arrived at hospital on January 13 and his condition worsened two weeks later. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Puerto Rican television actors Category:Puerto Rican comedians Category:Puerto Rican television personalities Category:Infectious disease deaths in Puerto Rico Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Actors from Ponce, Puerto Rico
title: Luis Raúl
